articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Google must delete 'manifestly inaccurate' information if asked, European Union court rules - ABC News
articles.description: Google must delete search results about people in Europe if they can prove that the information is clearly wrong, the European Union's top court rules.
articles.content:
Google must delete search results about people in Europe if it can be proven the information is clearly wrong, the EU's top court says.

articles.title: Toulouse's Dupont takes swipe at new-format Champions Cup - News24
articles.description: Toulouse scrumhalf Antoine Dupont, the 2021 World Player of the Year, hit out at the inclusion of South African teams in the new-look Champions Cup on Thursday, saying it was "no longer the European Cup".

articles.title: EU backs Croatia’s entry into Schengen, rejects Bulgaria, Romania - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: The European Council approves the admission of Croatia to the passport-free Schengen area from January 1.
articles.content:
European Union members have confirmed the admission of Croatia to the blocs passport-free Schengen area while rejecting the candidacies of Bulgaria and Romania.
